problem_text_cn: 如图,PA、PB分别切⊙O于点A、B,且PA=8,CD切⊙O于点E,交PA、PB于C、D两点,则△PCD的周长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB tangent ⊙O at vertices A and B respectively, and PA = N_0, CD tangents ⊙O at vertex E, and crosses PA and PB at C and D, then the perimeter of △PCD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵PA、PB分别切⊙O于点A、B,∴PA=PB=8,∵CD切⊙O于点E,∴CA=CE,DB=DE,∴△PCD的周长=PC+CD+PD=PC+CE+DE+PD=PC+AC+BD+PD=PA+PB=16．故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题考查了切线长定理质．注意得到△PCD的周长=PA+PB是关键．
